title: The Monster's Ring
description: Twist it once, you're horned and haired;Twist it twice and fangs are bared;Twist it thrice? No one has dared!  Russell is sure that the ring he gets at Mr. Elives' shop is just a silly magic trick, but he follows the instructions and twists the ring twice anyway--and becomes a monster!   Includes an author's note.
author: Bruce Coville
